channel.title: Jake Gyllenhaal on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Ben Stiller, Jeremy Allen White Circling ‘Airman,’ A24 in Talks to Land World War II Survival Tale (Exclusive)
item.description: If deals make, Stiller would direct while White would star in the adaptation of the non-fiction book by Seth Meyerowitz.
